condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2019, child rights are a priority in the public agenda and UNICEF is positioned as the authority in this issue, through the communication of gender-sensitive messages that mobilize people and resources.

description.narrative: Using CRC@30 as core narrative was a successful strategy as it produced a consistent narrative and public presence during the wrap-up year of the CPD. This theme also lent itself very well to initiatives linked to highlight the rights of girls and other vulnerable groups, an important factor when developing and implementing communication and public advocacy activities during the year. | Status:Met | As-of Date:24/01/2020

Generation and use of social, behavioural and communication data and evidence meets quality standards for informing and monitoring C4D strategies in Country Programme priorities

baseline.value: 3 baseline studies* met 2 quality standards (data sources and scope) to inform and monitor C4D strategies aligned to CP priorities. *Studies on prevention of Zika, health and nutrition project in partnership with Yakult and birth registration model in Chiapas and Guerrero.

target.value: 2018:At least 4 studies* meet 3 quality standards (data sources, scope and focus) to inform, monitor and adjust C4D strategies aligned to CP priorities. *Second phase of health and nutrition project in partnership with Yakult, U-Report strategy to promote adolescent participation and empowerment, Strategy in partnership with Rio Arronte to promote water consumption in secondary schools; Education strategy to enhance ECD parenting practices in rural communities

actual.value:
2018:Porcentaje de estrategias C4D basadas en evidencias: 100%
Total de estrategias C4D en 2018 basadas en evidencias 5 de 5: (Segunda fase Yakult implementada se basó en datos comportamentales levantados en línea base y reporte de monitoreo; proyecto ECHO, se levantaron 6 grupos focales en Chihuahua y

title.narrative: C4D support provided to enhance knowledge generation, management, dissemination meets quality standards

baseline.value: No C4D support provided to enhance knowledge generation, management and dissemination met quality standards.

target.value: 2018:C4D support provided to enhance knowledge generation, management and dissemination for at least one C4D case study meets 2 quality standards: knowledge generation and knowledge dissemination.
